fix: Fix CI/CD pipeline and optimize Hugging Face deployment

- Optimize Dockerfile to use requirements.txt for Python dependencies
- Ensure apt.txt is copied to Docker image for system dependencies
- Update package.json start script to use start.sh for proper initialization
- Use --no-cache-dir flag to reduce Docker image size

This fixes the failing CI/CD pipeline and ensures clean deployment to Hugging Face Spaces.
